content: the district court in ljubljana made a decision regarding a cost procedure the total cost is 792 eur which includes the court fee the procedure lasted 8 months and 17 days the case involves the distribution of assets and unpaid pension benefits with a total value of 157000 eur the assets include a gun a revolver and real estate properties the widow will receive unpaid pension benefits a portion of the real estate and funds from the bank account the son will inherit twothirds of the real estate and the daughter will receive the gun revolver and remaining real estate properties the court ruled based on the inheritance act and the parties involved reached an agreement the court identified the heirs and determined their shares the court received a death certificate and initiated succession proceedings the heirs submitted written declarations and the court declared them as intestate heirs the court registered the real estate in the names of the heirs the heiress must arrange for the transfer of movable property and the withdrawal of funds and pensions the net value of the estate is 157000 eur the heirs are responsible for paying a court fee the text provides instructions for lodging an appeal including the time frame and requirements the appeal will be decided by the ljubljana high court the text is dated october 4 2021 in ljubljana

metadata.subject_of_succession: unpaid pension benefits, funds on a personal bank account, gun, revolver, real estate
